title: Modern Apartment in Coveted Wedge Neighborhood - Motiv #212
posting_body: ['Modern Apartment in the Coveted Wedge Neighborhood- Motiv #212', 'Property Address', '1006 West 24th Street - 212 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub for your urban lifestyle!', 'All apartments offer modern and convenient living nestled in the coveted, historic Wedge neighborhood.', 'The building has free bike storage in the bike garage and a rooftop deck with lounge chairs and a community grill.', 'Metro transit commuters enjoy nearby stops within two blocks of the building, and drivers can easily access the main highways.', 'Bikers will enjoy being one block from Bryant Avenue, a bike boulevard that leads into downtown and also connects to the Midtown', 'Greenway just a few blocks South.', 'Apartment #212 is a second-floor alcove apartment with modern and upscale finishes and in-unit laundry.', 'It has an open concept floor plan with East-facing views and large windows that allow for great natural lighting.', 'The kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and a microwave.', 'Cats are welcome with an additional refundable $200 deposit, a $200 pet fee, and a pet rent of $35 per cat (max 2).', 'Check out our virtual tour below!', '<URL>', 'County: Hennepin • School District: Minneapolis', 'Call the Motiv Leasing Office at', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Additional photos and availability at <URL>.', 'View more properties at <URL>', 'The link below details
